org.apache.spark.ml.feature

类 Word2Vec

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.PipelineStage
      • org.apache.spark.ml.Estimator<Word2VecModel>
        • org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Word2Vec
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, Logging, Word2VecBase, Params, HasInputCol, HasMaxIter, HasOutputCol, HasSeed, HasStepSize, DefaultParamsWritable, Identifiable, MLWritable

    public final class Word2Vec
extends Estimator<Word2VecModel>
implements Word2VecBase, DefaultParamsWritable
    Word2Vec trains a model of Map(String, Vector), i.e. transforms a word into a code for further natural language processing or machine learning process.
    另请参阅:

      • maxSentenceLength

        public final IntParam maxSentenceLength()
        从接口复制的说明: Word2VecBase
        Sets the maximum length (in words) of each sentence in the input data. Any sentence longer than this threshold will be divided into chunks of up to maxSentenceLength size. Default: 1000
        指定者:
        maxSentenceLength 在接口中 Word2VecBase

      • transformSchema

        public StructType transformSchema(StructType schema)
        从类复制的说明: PipelineStage
        :: DeveloperApi ::

        Check transform validity and derive the output schema from the input schema.

        We check validity for interactions between parameters during transformSchema and raise an exception if any parameter value is invalid. Parameter value checks which do not depend on other parameters are handled by Param.validate().

        Typical implementation should first conduct verification on schema change and parameter validity, including complex parameter interaction checks.

        指定者:
        transformSchema 在类中 PipelineStage
        参数:
        schema - (undocumented)
        返回:
        (undocumented)
